title: Slice Keyboard Version 1.0.5
summary: Slice Keyboard version 1.0.5 has been released with a few bug fixes.

parts.content:
Slice Keyboard version 1.0.5 has been released with a few bug fixes.

  • Fixed bug preventing keyboard from properly opening when the animations are turned off. - Fixed issues submitted in crash reports.
